data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 800,000 people living in Lunda Norte.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lunda Norte, Angola
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 184,934 believers in the state of Lunda Norte with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, help the 184,934 believers in Lunda Norte to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Lunda Norte with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Lunda Norte, Angola know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Lunda Norte against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Lunda Norte, Angola find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lunda Norte, Angola has a population of 800,000.

We estimate Lunda Norte has 184,934 people who might know Jesus, 548,752 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 66,314 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.
